name: Madrax
overview: The kingdom of Almahagor was a happy land until the day darkness fell upon it. Cruel evil reigned in the country. The only way to take back the magomaca was to defeat the beast that served him. To do this, it was necessary to cut it off from the native land by closing the Gate. According to an ancient book, the gates of hell slammed shut surrounded by six idols of the god Thor, which were hidden in the basement of Morador's fortress. Many knights have tried to find them without success. It's up to Toble to save the country! If Cisiti is brave enough to face the underworld of Morador, head for the setting sun. In the frontiers of the realm, there is an ancient fortress...
